page.title: 19LOCAL TRAFFIC.
page.content: The Public Transport systems in this area is provided by railway trains and buses. There are no Taxi services in the area but the nearest ones are in Eastleigh, which is about six miles away,and Bishop's Waltham. Surveys were conducted on road vehicle movements at various locations on week -day afternoons.The places were; West End to Durley road, West End to Botley (Grange road) and Shamblehurst Lane. A total of 568 vehicles were logged and the percentage breakdown was as follows: Buses--0.7%,Lorries--9.5%,Motor Cars--77%,Vans--9.7%,Farm Vehicles--0.5%,Motorcycles--2.3%,Pedal cycles--0.5%.The area consists mainly of small country lanes which have a small amount of traffic on them.The M27 runs through the S/W of the area.
